summary: A fiendish conductor takes over a school band. She eliminates five musicians who then form their own ensemble. With the help of their former conductor the new band, accidentally registered ... See full summary »
cast: Henrik Mestad|Cecilie A. Mosli|August Ekanger|Ann Kristin Sømme|Oriana Brut-Christensen|Sol Elisabeth Sifsdatter Larsen|Moin Deljou|Fride Bakken|Heike Christine Thea Berg|Carl Martin Eggesbø|Jacob Vigeland
title: Orps: The Movie
